code: import{ADD_CART_ITEM,REMOVE_CART_ITEM}from"../utils/constants";export var addCartItem=function addCartItem(product,qty){return function(dispatch){var item={id:product.id,category:product.category,name:product.name,image:product.image,price:product.price,countInStock:product.countInStock,qty:qty};dispatch({type:ADD_CART_ITEM,payload:item});};};export var removeCartItem=function removeCartItem(productId){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:REMOVE_CART_ITEM,payload:productId});};};
